ComicInfo.Summary: Sara saves a reporter from the deadly Marinette. When she discovers that the loa demon is the Crown Heights killer, she uses magic to summon Marinette and uses the Witchblade to dispose of her. Danielle confronts Finch's abusive boyfriend.
ComicInfo.Tags: Rock,New York City,Finch,Fortune Teller,Michael Fogg,Gretchen Fullmer,Sara Pezzini,Witchblade,Marinette Bwa Chech,New York State,Danielle Baptiste
ComicInfo.Title: Crown Heights Part 3; Credits and Recap
